amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for refugee and entrant assistance by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for refugee and entrant assistance by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 179 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 179 (Roll no. 252).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Shalala.
